page.title: 01Landscape
page.content: Our block is situated between Leeds and Sheffield.It has 4 villages Royston pop. 8,900. Shafton pop.2,700. South Hiendley pop.1,738.Cold Hiendley with Havercroft pop.2,234.We have a choice of amenities to offer e.g. squash courts, cricket fields,football fields,a swimming pool,horse riding, Cubs,Scouts,Girls Brigade,Brownies, Guides,Majorettes,libraries.The parks offer the usual facilities of a playground and a grassed area but Royston has tennis courts and bowling greens.Our block is well served for Education by nurseries, play, primary and secondary schools. Royston Fire Station also serves Shafton. South Elmsall serves the rest of our block. Royston Police Station only serves Royston. Hemsworth serves the rest.We have no train service but have a good bus system.Walking facilities are good
